trans-unit.source: whether or not widget can be a default widget.
whether or not widget can own the input focus
whether or not widget has a tooltip.

trans-unit.source: whether or not the given tooltip context points to an item

with the difference that the former will only emit a row_inserted signal, while the latter will emit row_inserted, row_changed and, if the list store is sorted, rows_reordered. Since emitting the rows_reordered signal repeatedly can affect the performance of the program, gtk_list_store_insert_with_values() should generally be preferred when inserting rows in a sorted list store.
trans-unit.target: 区别在于前者仅发出row_inserted信号，而后者将发出row_inserted，row_changed，并且如果对列表存储进行了排序，则将进行row_reordered。由于反复发出rows_reordered信号会影响程序的性能，因此在将行插入已排序列表存储区时，通常应首选 gtk_list_store_insert_with_values() 。

trans-unit.source: with the different that the former will only emit a row_inserted signal, while the latter will emit row_inserted, row_changed and if the tree store is sorted, rows_reordered. Since emitting the rows_reordered signal repeatedly can affect the performance of the program, gtk_tree_store_insert_with_values() should generally be preferred when inserting rows in a sorted tree store.
trans-unit.target: 区别在于前者将仅发出row_inserted信号，而后者将发出row_inserted，row_changed，并且如果对树存储进行了排序，则将rows_reordered。由于重复发出rows_reordered信号会影响程序的性能，因此在将行插入已排序的树存储中时，通常应首选 gtk_tree_store_insert_with_values() 。

wrap
wrap text, breaking lines anywhere the cursor can appear (between characters, usually - if you want to be technical, between graphemes, see pango_get_log_attrs())
trans-unit.target: 换行，在光标可能出现的任何地方都断行（通常在字符之间-如果您想提高技术，请在字形之间，请参见 pango_get_log_attrs() ）

trans-unit.source: wrap text, breaking lines in between words
wrap text, breaking lines in between words, or if that is not enough, also between graphemes
trans-unit.target: 绕文字,在字与字之间划线,如果不够,也可以在字词之间划线
